metadata.name: Diskshadow Script Mode - Execution From Potential Suspicious Location
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "Diskshadow.exe" in script mode using the "/s" flag where the script is located in a potentially suspicious location.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('diskshadow.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\diskshadow.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—s ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―s '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\programdata\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "Diskshadow.exe" in script mode using the "/s" flag where the script is located in a potentially suspicious location.

metadata.objective: False positive: False positives may occur if you execute the script from one of the paths mentioned in the rule. Apply additional filters that fits your org needs. References: https://bohops.com/2018/03/26/diskshadow-the-return-of-vss-evasion-persistence-and-active-directory-database-extraction/, https://www.ired.team/offensive-security/credential-access-and-credential-dumping/ntds.dit-enumeration, https://medium.com/@cyberjyot/lolbin-execution-via-diskshadow-f6ff681a27a4, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/diskshadow, https://www.lifars.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/GriefRansomware_Whitepaper-2.pdf, https://www.zscaler.com/blogs/security-research/technical-analysis-crytox-ransomware, https://research.checkpoint.com/2022/evilplayout-attack-against-irans-state-broadcaster/
